item.title: Capital One shares climb as investors buy into the vision of its future with Discover
item.description: The quarterly numbers are hard to judge. The long-term benefits of owning Discover are easy to see, though.

item.title: Trump backs further away from firing Powell: 'He's going to be out pretty soon anyway'
item.description: The president has accused Powell of being political and nicknamed him "too late" when it came time to adjusting interest rates.
